post.summary: Assign a badge to a user
post.description: Assign a badge to a user and send a notification to the user in Slack.

200.description: Assigns a badge to a user

get.summary: Get a list of calendar events in the community
get.description: Get a list of calendar events in the community.

parameters.description: Filters results to events whose date and time fall entirely or partially within the specified time frame category
parameters.name: time_filter

parameters.description: Filters results to events with the specified status
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Filters results based on whether the events are published to the site. If not provided, all events are returned regardless of site publication configuration.
parameters.name: published_to_site

parameters.description: Filters results based on whether the events are unlisted. If not provided, all events are returned.
parameters.name: is_unlisted

200.description: Gets a list of calendar events in the community

description_slack_blocks.description: The event description in Slack blocks format.

recap_slack_blocks.description: The event recap in Slack blocks format.

slug.description: The URL slug for the event.

publish_to_slack_channels.description: The Slack channel(s) and connected site feed(s), if any, that the event announcements are posted to when published.

hosts.description: The user(s) featured as a host for the event.

speakers.description: The user(s) featured as a speaker for the event.

description_slack_blocks.description: The event description in Slack blocks format. Only one of description_blocks or description_text must be present.

description_text.description: The event description in plaintext format. Only one of description_blocks or description_text must be present.

recap_slack_blocks.description: The event recap in Slack blocks format. Only one of recap_slack_blocks or recap_text must be present.

recap_text.description: The event recap in Slack blocks format. Only one of recap_slack_blocks or recap_text must be present.

slug.description: The URL slug for the event. If not provided, one will be generated based off the title.

status.description: The event status. Events created with "published" status will immediately be published to the specified Slack channel(s) and possibly to the site.

publish_to_slack_channels.description: The Slack channel(s) that the event announcements are posted to when published.

hosts.description: The Slack user(s) featured as a host for the event.

speakers.description: The Slack user(s) featured as a speaker for the event.

tags.description: The ids of the tags for the event.

description_slack_blocks.description: The event description in Slack blocks format.

recap_slack_blocks.description: The event recap in Slack blocks format.

slug.description: The URL slug for the event.

publish_to_slack_channels.description: The Slack channel(s) and connected site feed(s), if any, that the event announcements are posted to when published.

hosts.description: The user(s) featured as a host for the event.

speakers.description: The user(s) featured as a speaker for the event.

get.description: [Closed Alpha] Search documents using a query string and return relevant results.

put.description: Adds a user as a member of a group.
